description.zh-cn: 中国国民党高级将领，曾任湖南、江西、浙江三省主席。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the Kuomintang, who served as the chairman of Hunan, Jiangxi, and Zhejiang provinces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的浙江省最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Zhejiang Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，鲁涤平在浙江省政府主席职位上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, predecessor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Zhejiang Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，新桂系三巨头之一，鲁涤平在浙江省政府主席职位上的继任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, one of the three leaders of the New Guangxi clique, and the successor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Zhejiang Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的江西省最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Jiangxi Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事及政治人物，鲁涤平在江西省政府主席职位上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure, predecessor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Jiangxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事及政治人物，鲁涤平在江西省政府主席职位上的继任。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure, the successor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Jiangxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的湖南省最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Hunan Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，鲁涤平在湖南省政府主席职位上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese military figure, predecessor of Lu Diping as the Chairman of Hunan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事及政治人物，曾为鲁涤平的下属，后成为其政治对手并接替其湖南省主席职位。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure, who was once Lu Diping's subordinate and later became his political rival, succeeding him as the Chairman of Hunan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省的县，是鲁涤平的出生地。
description.en: A county in Hunan Province, China, the birthplace of Lu Diping.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首都，鲁涤平的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the Republic of China, where Lu Diping passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，鲁涤平为其高级将领。
description.en: The founding party of the Republic of China, of which Lu Diping was a high-ranking general.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平的妾室，在鲁涤平死后自杀并与其合葬。
description.en: Lu Diping's concubine, who committed suicide after his death and was buried with him.

description.zh-cn: 清末位于湖南的军事学校，鲁涤平曾在此就读。
description.en: A military school in Hunan during the late Qing Dynasty, where Lu Diping studied.

description.zh-cn: 推翻中国清朝的革命，鲁涤平曾参与其中。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew China's Qing dynasty, in which Lu Diping participated.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山于1914年成立的革命政党，是中国国民党的前身之一。
description.en: A revolutionary political party founded by Sun Yat-sen in 1914, one of the predecessors of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1921年湖南军阀与湖北军阀之间的战争，鲁涤平作为湘军师长参战。
description.en: A war between the Hunan warlords and Hubei warlords in 1921, in which Lu Diping participated as a division commander of the Hunan Army.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期湖南军阀，在湘鄂战争期间是鲁涤平的指挥官。
description.en: A Hunan warlord during the Republican era, who was Lu Diping's commander during the Hunan-Hubei War.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期湖南军政人物，鲁涤平曾追随他加入孙中山阵营。
description.en: A military and political figure in Hunan during the Republican era, whom Lu Diping followed to join Sun Yat-sen's camp.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国国父。鲁涤平曾率部加入其麾下。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and founding father of the Republic of China. Lu Diping once led his troops to join his command.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制部队之一，鲁涤平曾任该军副军长及军长。
description.en: One of the units of the National Revolutionary Army, where Lu Diping served as deputy commander and commander.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党领导、旨在统一中国的军事行动，鲁涤平在其中担任军长。
description.en: A military campaign led by the Kuomintang aimed at unifying China, in which Lu Diping served as an army commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，新桂系领袖。鲁涤平曾是其麾下军团总指挥。
description.en: A Chinese military strategist and leader of the New Guangxi clique. Lu Diping once served as a corps commander under him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的军阀派系之一。曾支持鲁涤平，后又将其免职，引发鲁案。
description.en: A warlord clique during the Republic of China era. It initially supported Lu Diping but later dismissed him, triggering the Lu Diping Incident.

description.zh-cn: 新桂系将领，主导了免去鲁涤平湖南省主席职务的行动。
description.en: A general of the New Guangxi clique who led the action to remove Lu Diping from his position as Chairman of Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 1929年2月，新桂系将领胡宗铎以国民党武汉政治分会名义免去鲁涤平湖南省主席职务并收缴其部队武装的政治事件，该事件是蒋桂战争的直接导火索。
description.en: In February 1929, the political incident where New Guangxi clique general Hu Zongduo, in the name of the Wuhan Political Council of the KMT, dismissed Lu Diping as Chairman of Hunan and disarmed his troops. This event was the direct trigger for the Chiang-Gui War.

description.zh-cn: 1929年南京国民政府与新桂系军阀之间的战争，由鲁案引发。
description.en: A war in 1929 between the Nationalist Government in Nanjing and the New Guangxi clique, triggered by the Lu Diping Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事领袖。在鲁案发生后，鲁涤平向其申冤，蒋中正以此为契机发动了蒋桂战争。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China. After the Lu Diping Incident, Lu appealed to him, and Chiang Kai-shek used this as an opportunity to launch the Chiang-Gui War.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制部队之一，鲁涤平曾任该军总指挥，参与第一次江西剿共战争。
description.en: One of the units of the National Revolutionary Army, commanded by Lu Diping during the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府对中国工农红军发动的第一次“围剿”，鲁涤平担任主力指挥官但以失败告终。
description.en: The first "encirclement campaign" launched by the Nationalist Government against the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, in which Lu Diping was the main commander but ended in failure.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。其“诱敌深入”的游击战略在第一次江西剿共战争中击败了鲁涤平的部队。
description.en: The main founder of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. His guerrilla strategy of "luring the enemy in deep" defeated Lu Diping's forces in the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第18师师长，在第一次江西剿共战争期间为鲁涤平的下属。
description.en: Commander of the 18th Division of the National Revolutionary Army, a subordinate of Lu Diping during the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第50师师长，在第一次江西剿共战争期间为鲁涤平的下属。
description.en: Commander of the 50th Division of the National Revolutionary Army, a subordinate of Lu Diping during the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府的军事智囊和顾问机构，鲁涤平晚年在此担任虚职副院长。
description.en: A military think tank and advisory body of the Nationalist Government, where Lu Diping served as a nominal vice president in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 1934年《申报》主持人史量才被刺杀的案件，传闻鲁涤平的猝死与此案有关。
description.en: The assassination case of Shi Liangcai, the head of the newspaper Shen Bao, in 1934. It is rumored that Lu Diping's sudden death was related to this case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任国家主席。鲁涤平是其表兄。
description.en: A statesman of the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the PRC. Lu Diping was his cousin.

description.zh-cn: 教育家、书法家，鲁涤平的弟弟。
description.en: An educator and calligrapher, the younger brother of Lu Diping.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制部队之一，鲁涤平曾任该军军长。
description.en: One of the units of the National Revolutionary Army, where Lu Diping served as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平在辛亥革命时参与了后续各省的独立起义运动。
description.en: During the Xinhai Revolution, Lu Diping participated in the subsequent independence and uprising movements in various provinces.

description.zh-cn: 在1921年的湘鄂战争中，鲁涤平在赵恒惕的指挥下参战。
description.en: In the Hunan-Hubei War of 1921, Lu Diping fought under the command of Zhao Hengti.

description.zh-cn: 作为湖南陆军第二师师长参与了湘鄂战争。
description.en: Participated in the Hunan-Hubei War as the commander of the Second Division of the Hunan Army.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，鲁涤平跟随谭延闿离开湖南，加入孙中山麾下。
description.en: In 1923, Lu Diping followed Tan Yankai, left Hunan, and joined Sun Yat-sen's command.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，鲁涤平率领部分部队到广东加入孙中山麾下。
description.en: In 1923, Lu Diping led some of his troops to Guangdong to join Sun Yat-sen's command.

description.zh-cn: 在国民党北伐中担任第二军军长代理兼右翼指挥官，后升任军长。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, he served as the acting commander of the Second Army and commander of the right wing, and was later promoted to full commander.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平曾任第四集团军第一军团总指挥，隶属于第四集团军总指挥李宗仁。
description.en: Lu Diping served as the commander of the First Army Corps of the Fourth Army Group, subordinate to Li Zongren, the commander-in-chief of the Fourth Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 1928年5月，鲁涤平得到新桂系支持，出任湖南省政府主席。
description.en: In May 1928, Lu Diping received support from the New Guangxi clique and became the Chairman of the Hunan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，鲁涤平在担任湘鄂“会剿”总指挥时，将前线作战交由何键指挥。
description.en: In 1928, when Lu Diping was the commander-in-chief of the Hunan-Hubei "Encirclement and Suppression" headquarters, he delegated frontline combat command to He Jian.

description.zh-cn: 何键教唆新桂系处理鲁涤平，并最终夺得其湖南省主席职位，成为其政治对手。
description.en: He Jian instigated the New Guangxi clique to deal with Lu Diping and eventually seized his position as Chairman of Hunan, becoming his political rival.

description.zh-cn: 新桂系通过其控制的国民党武汉政治分会名义上免去了鲁涤平的职务，制造了鲁案。
description.en: The New Guangxi clique initiated the Lu Diping Incident by nominally dismissing him through the KMT's Wuhan Political Council, which they controlled.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗铎假借国民党武汉政治分会名义，主导了免去鲁涤平职务的行动。
description.en: Hu Zongduo, under the pretext of the KMT's Wuhan Political Council, led the action to dismiss Lu Diping.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁案中，鲁涤平被免去湖南省主席职务，其部队被缴械。
description.en: In the Lu Diping Incident, Lu was dismissed from his position as Chairman of Hunan and his troops were disarmed.

description.zh-cn: 鲁案的仲裁最终诱发了新桂系与蒋介石之间的蒋桂战争。
description.en: The arbitration of the Lu Diping Incident ultimately triggered the Chiang-Gui War between the New Guangxi clique and Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 鲁案发生后，鲁涤平逃往南京向时任国民政府主席蒋中正申冤，寻求其支持。
description.en: After the Lu Diping Incident, he fled to Nanjing to appeal to Chiang Kai-shek, then Chairman of the Nationalist Government, seeking his support.

description.zh-cn: 张辉瓒时任国民革命军第18师师长，是鲁涤平担任第九路军总指挥时的下属。
description.en: Zhang Huizan, then commander of the 18th Division of the National Revolutionary Army, was a subordinate of Lu Diping when Lu was commander of the Ninth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 谭道源时任国民革命军第50师师长，是鲁涤平担任第九路军总指挥时的下属。
description.en: Tan Daoyuan, then commander of the 50th Division of the National Revolutionary Army, was a subordinate of Lu Diping when Lu was commander of the Ninth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平担任第一次江西剿共战争的主力指挥官。
description.en: Lu Diping served as the main commander of the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次江西剿共战争中，毛泽东运用“诱敌深入”的游击战略击败了鲁涤平指挥的部队。
description.en: In the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign, Mao Zedong used the guerrilla strategy of "luring the enemy in deep" to defeat the troops commanded by Lu Diping.

description.zh-cn: 由于在第一次江西剿共战争中惨败，鲁涤平被撤销了南昌行营主任、第九路军总指挥等职务。
description.en: Due to the disastrous defeat in the First Jiangxi Encirclement Campaign, Lu Diping was removed from his posts, including Director of the Nanchang Field Headquarters and Commander-in-Chief of the Ninth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平中年暴亡，传闻其死因与史量才被刺案有关。
description.en: Lu Diping died suddenly in middle age, and it is rumored that his death was related to the assassination of Shi Liangcai.

description.zh-cn: 鲁涤平的姑母是刘少奇的母亲，二人是表兄弟关系。
description.en: Lu Diping's paternal aunt was Liu Shaoqi's mother, making them first cousins.

description.zh-cn: 沙氏是鲁涤平的妾室。
description.en: Sha was Lu Diping's concubine.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：鲁涤平接替张难先担任浙江省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Lu Diping succeeded Zhang Nanxian as the Chairman of Zhejiang Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：黄绍竑接替鲁涤平担任浙江省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Huang Shaohong succeeded Lu Diping as the Chairman of Zhejiang Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：鲁涤平接替朱培德担任江西省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Lu Diping succeeded Zhu Peide as the Chairman of Jiangxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：熊式辉接替鲁涤平担任江西省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Xiong Shihui succeeded Lu Diping as the Chairman of Jiangxi Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：鲁涤平接替唐生智担任湖南省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: Lu Diping succeeded Tang Shengzhi as the Chairman of Hunan Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：何键接替鲁涤平担任湖南省政府主席。
description.en: Succession of office: He Jian succeeded Lu Diping as the Chairman of Hunan Provincial Government.
